about.title: Why Choose Us
about.description: We understand that pets are more than just animals—they're family. That's why we're here to provide the highest level of care for your beloved companions.
about.feature1: Prioritizing health, happiness, and ultimate comfort.
about.feature2: Comprehensive care to meet their specific needs, from cats to pets.

expertTips.title: Tips From Our Expert
expertTips.tip1: Ensure your cat gets health checks at our vet clinic.
expertTips.tip2: Maintain a balanced diet with our nutritional health insights.
expertTips.tip3: Regular play and exercise to prevent obesity in felines.

testimonials.title: What People Say
testimonials.description: Genuine Stories and Heartfelt Experiences from Happy Cat Parents who Trust Our Care!

1.name: Budi Santoso
1.content: VetCare has been amazing! The staff is so caring and professional. Max loves coming here!

2.name: Siti Nurhaliza
2.content: Best vet clinic in town. They saved Luna's life during an emergency. Forever grateful!

3.name: Ahmad Wijaya
3.content: Professional service, clean facility, and reasonable prices. Highly recommended!
